name: Weirdo (KikooDX)
description:
Weirdo is a fast paced platformer, giving you 10 seconds to beat each screen.

  •  Handcrafted levels
  • Fluid gameplay
  • Single screen levels
  • Speedrun features
  • 1-bit graphics and palettes (use 0-9 to change palette)
  • More?

Default controls:

  • Menu: Arrow keys and Enter
  • Play: Left, right and up
  • Fullscreen: F11
  • Color palettes: 0-9

Thanks for playing :)

Credits

A game created by KikooDX
